Detailed Description

A LogHandler that outputs messages to a file.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ FileLogHandler() [1/2]

rev::FileLogHandler::FileLogHandler ( const GString &  filename)

Create a LogHandler to write log messages to a file.

Outputs messages at Debug or higher in level.

Parameters
[in]filenameThe full path of a file. If the file does not exist, it will be created, otherwise it will be truncated.

◆ FileLogHandler() [2/2]

rev::FileLogHandler::FileLogHandler ( LogLevel  level,
const GString &  filename 
)

Create a LogHandler to write log messages to a file.

Parameters
[in]levelMessages with a log level higher than this will be written out to the file.
[in]filenameThe full path of a file. If the file does not exist, it will be created, otherwise it will be truncated.
